alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 10:21PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN BRACKEN, NORTHEASTERN PENDLETON, SOUTHEASTERN CLERMONT AND CENTRAL BROWN COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM EST... At 1021 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located near Neville, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Mount Orab, Bethel, Williamsburg, Augusta, Felicity, Brooksville, Russellville, Hamersville, Higginsport, Moscow, Neville, Chilo, Mount Auburn, Browning Corner, Willow Grove, Bradford, Saltair, Ivor and Point Isabel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
